beaches.name: Bora Bora, French Polynesia
beaches.description: Turquoise lagoon, overwater bungalows, and stunning volcanic peaks. Perfect for honeymooners and luxury seekers.

beaches.name: Whitehaven Beach, Australia
beaches.description: 7km of pure white silica sand and crystal-clear waters. One of the world's most beautiful beaches.

temples.name: Angkor Wat, Cambodia
temples.description: The largest religious monument in the world, built in the 12th century. A masterpiece of Khmer architecture.

temples.name: Golden Temple, India
temples.description: Sacred Sikh shrine covered in real gold, surrounded by the holy sarovar. A symbol of peace and equality.

countries.name: Sydney, Australia
countries.description: Iconic Opera House, Harbour Bridge, and beautiful beaches. A vibrant city with endless activities.

countries.name: Tokyo, Japan
countries.description: Neon-lit metropolis with ancient temples, amazing food, and unique culture. Where tradition meets future.
